section.name: Playlists
section.p: The Jukes supports both Winamp M3U files and the new XSPF "Spiff" Playlists.

subsection.name: XSPF 'Spiff'
subsection.p:
XSPF is the XML format for sharing playlists. www.xspf.org
* It is open -- No proprietary lock-in. * It is portable -- You should be able to send a playlist to your friend and have it work. * It is well-engineered -- Most playlist formats get the easy things wrong.
Unlike M3U XSPF is XML. Unlike SMIL XSPF is simple. Unlike ASX XSPF is open.
XSPF is implemented using the JSpiff Java API for XSPF written by Melloware.
